name: Free Cookie Day!
description:
Keep throwing the customers their cookies and keep punching that clock to make Free Cookie Day last as long as possible. Get those cats their cookies!

Made for My First Game Jam Summer 2021. This is, as the name suggests, my first game jam--and also my first game--and I have no idea what I'm doing, so any feedback would be super appreciated! 

Playtime: 5-10 minutes.
